mapper.select: SELECT "G0GSJC", round( sum("K0BNYSJHJE")/10000,2) AS "K0BNYSJHJE", round( sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB")/10000,2) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB", round( sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB")/sum("K0BNYSJHJE"),4) as K0BNZJBL FROM ( SELECT "G0GSJC", sum("K0BNYSJHJE") AS "K0BNYSJHJE", sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB") AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_01"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by "G0GSJC" UNION ALL SELECT "G0GSJC", sum("K0BNYSJHJE") AS "K0BNYSJHJE", sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB") AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_04"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by "G0GSJC" ) group by "G0GSJC"

SELECT "G0GSJC", CASE WHEN "G0XMDL" = 'F' THEN '科研费用性支出' WHEN "G0XMDL" = 'Z' THEN '科研装备支出' end as K0FYLB, round( sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB")/10000,2) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM ( SELECT "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL", sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB") AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_01"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL" UNION ALL SELECT "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL", sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB") AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_04"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL" ) where "G0XMDL" = '${g0XMDL}' group by "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL"

SELECT "G0GSJC", CASE WHEN "G0XMDL" = 'F' THEN '科研费用性支出' WHEN "G0XMDL" = 'Z' THEN '科研装备支出' end as K0FYLB, round( sum("K0BNYSJHJE")/10000, 2) AS "K0BNYSJHJE" FROM ( SELECT "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL", sum("K0BNYSJHJE") AS "K0BNYSJHJE" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_01"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL" UNION ALL SELECT "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL", sum("K0BNYSJHJE") AS "K0BNYSJHJE" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_04"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL" ) where "G0XMDL" = '${g0XMDL}' group by "G0GSJC", "G0XMDL"

SELECT distinct G0XMGLLX, G0XMGLJB, G0XMLXMS, round( sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB")/10000,2) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM ( SELECT G0XMGLLX, G0XMGLJB, G0XMLXMS, sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB") AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_01"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by G0XMGLLX, G0XMGLJB, G0XMLXMS UNION ALL SELECT G0XMGLLX, G0XMGLJB, G0XMLXMS,
sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB") AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_04"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by G0XMGLLX, G0XMGLJB, G0XMLXMS ) group by G0XMGLLX, G0XMGLJB, G0XMLXMS order by G0XMGLLX, G0XMGLJB, G0XMLXMS

SELECT "G0GSJC", round( sum("K0BNYSJHJE")/10000,2) AS "K0BNYSJHJE", round( sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB")/10000,2) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB", round( sum("K0BNYSJHJE")/10000,2) - round( sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB")/10000,2) AS K0BNYSJY, round( sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB")/NULLIF(sum("K0BNYSJHJE"),0),4) as K0BNZJSYBL FROM ( SELECT "G0GSJC", sum("K0BNYSJHJE") AS "K0BNYSJHJE", sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB") AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_01"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by "G0GSJC" UNION ALL SELECT "G0GSJC", sum("K0BNYSJHJE") AS "K0BNYSJHJE", sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB") AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_04"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}')) group by "G0GSJC" ) group by "G0GSJC" limit ${pageSize} offset ${start}

select "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD", round(sum("K0BNYSJHJE"),0) AS "K0BNYSJHJE", round(sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB"),0) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB", round(sum("K0BNYSL"),0) AS "K0BNYSL", round(sum("K0BNYSJY"),0) AS "K0BNYSJY", round(sum("K0LJYSL"),0) AS "K0LJYSL", round(sum("K0ZTYSJE"),0) AS "K0ZTYSJE", round(sum("K0LJYSJY") ,0)AS "K0LJYSJY"
from ( SELECT "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD", round(sum("K0BNYSJHJE"),0) AS "K0BNYSJHJE", round(sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB"),0) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB", round(sum("K0BNYSL"),0) AS "K0BNYSL", round(sum("K0BNYSJY"),0) AS "K0BNYSJY", round(sum("K0LJYSL"),0) AS "K0LJYSL", round(sum("K0ZTYSJE"),0) AS "K0ZTYSJE", round(sum("K0LJYSJY") ,0)AS "K0LJYSJY" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_01"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}'))
GROUP BY "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD"
union all
SELECT "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD", round(sum("K0BNYSJHJE"),0) AS "K0BNYSJHJE", round(sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB"),0) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB", round(sum("K0BNYSL"),0) AS "K0BNYSL", round(sum("K0BNYSJY"),0) AS "K0BNYSJY", round(sum("K0LJYSL"),0) AS "K0LJYSL", round(sum("K0ZTYSJE"),0) AS "K0ZTYSJE", round(sum("K0LJYSJY") ,0)AS "K0LJYSJY" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_04"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}'))
GROUP BY "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD" ) GROUP BY "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD" limit ${pageSize} offset ${start}

select count(*) from ( select "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD", round(sum("K0BNYSJHJE"),0) AS "K0BNYSJHJE", round(sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB"),0) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB", round(sum("K0BNYSL"),0) AS "K0BNYSL", round(sum("K0BNYSJY"),0) AS "K0BNYSJY", round(sum("K0LJYSL"),0) AS "K0LJYSL", round(sum("K0ZTYSJE"),0) AS "K0ZTYSJE", round(sum("K0LJYSJY") ,0)AS "K0LJYSJY"
from ( SELECT "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD", round(sum("K0BNYSJHJE"),0) AS "K0BNYSJHJE", round(sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB"),0) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB", round(sum("K0BNYSL"),0) AS "K0BNYSL", round(sum("K0BNYSJY"),0) AS "K0BNYSJY", round(sum("K0LJYSL"),0) AS "K0LJYSL", round(sum("K0ZTYSJE"),0) AS "K0ZTYSJE", round(sum("K0LJYSJY") ,0)AS "K0LJYSJY" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_01"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}'))
GROUP BY "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD"
union all
SELECT "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD", round(sum("K0BNYSJHJE"),0) AS "K0BNYSJHJE", round(sum("K0BNGLFPHJECB"),0) AS "K0BNGLFPHJECB", round(sum("K0BNYSL"),0) AS "K0BNYSL", round(sum("K0BNYSJY"),0) AS "K0BNYSJY", round(sum("K0LJYSL"),0) AS "K0LJYSL", round(sum("K0ZTYSJE"),0) AS "K0ZTYSJE", round(sum("K0LJYSJY") ,0)AS "K0LJYSJY" FROM "_SYS_BIC"."SINOPEC.ZBYY.KJBYY.001_KYGLFXYY/H1AM_KY_SY_1001_04"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_CALMONTH$$', '${month}'), 'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$PR_GSDM$$', '${companyCode}'))
GROUP BY "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD" ) GROUP BY "G0CALD", "G0GSDM", "G0GSJC", "G0FLAG", "G0PROJCODE", "G0PROJTXT", "G0XMGLLX", "G0XMGLLY", "G0XMGLJB", "G0XMLX", "G0XMLXMS", "G0XMZT", "G0XMZTMS", "G0XMXZ", "G0XMDL", "G0XMJD" )
